article_title: Privacy And IP Laterals In Demand For 2014
article_text:
Privacy And IP Laterals In Demand For 2014

Law360, New York (January 1, 2014, 10:08 AM ET) -- Law firms are expected to more actively recruit lateral hires in corporate, intellectual property, privacy, white collar defense and health care practices in 2014 as they continue to chase growth opportunities and respond to client needs amid a global economic recovery, experts say.



The robust pace of lateral hiring that carried through much of 2013 is expected to continue with little to no slowdown in 2014 as firms pursue partners or senior associates with their own books of business in areas where firms are looking to...

To view the full article, register now.
